
Match following IP address :

192.168.0.1
192.168.0.1/
192.168.0.1/0
192.168.0.1/1
192.168.0.1/2
192.168.0.1/3
192.168.0.1/4
192.168.0.1/5
192.168.0.1/6
192.168.0.1/7
192.168.0.1/8
192.168.0.1/9
192.168.0.1/10
192.168.0.1/11
192.168.0.1/12
192.168.0.1/13
192.168.0.1/14
192.168.0.1/15
192.168.0.1/16
192.168.0.1/17
192.168.0.1/18
192.168.0.1/19
192.168.0.1/20
192.168.0.1/21
192.168.0.1/22
192.168.0.1/23
192.168.0.1/24
192.168.0.1/25
192.168.0.1/26
192.168.0.1/27
192.168.0.1/28
192.168.0.1/29
192.168.0.1/30
192.168.0.1/31
192.168.0.1/32
192.168.0.1/33
192.168.0.1/34
192.168.0.1/asd
192.168.0.1/01
192.168.0.1/00


without verifing IP address range : ^([\d]{1,3}.){3}[\d]{1,3}(/([0-9]|1[0-9]|2[0-9]|3[0-2]))?$
with verifing IP address range:
